sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
clusterID,
confidence_score,
globalID,
RecID,
posRawContainerRecID,
posFirstName,
posMiddleInitial,
posLastName,
posCustomerEmail1,
posCustomerEmail2,
posCustomerEmail3,
posCustomerPhone1,
posCustomerPhone2,
posCustomerPhone3,
n_address,
n_addr2,
n_city,
n_state,
n_zip9,
posFaceBookID,
posTwitterID,
market_id,
customer_type,
timestamp,
customer_since,
dtec,
posFirstNameSoundex,
posLastNameSoundex,
Alpha,
SourceSystem,
SourceSubSystem,
racProfitCenter,
racSalesNumber,
do_not_sell,
EntryID,
do_not_sell_request_date,
unsubscribe,
unsubscribe_date,
birthdate
FROM @{pipeline().parameters.CDPSchema}.@{pipeline().parameters.CDPTableName} WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE YEAR(dtec)=@{pipeline().parameters.Year} AND MONTH(dtec)=@{pipeline().parameters.Month}

source.sqlReaderQuery:
Select distinct 
F_WAREHOUSE_ID
,F_ASHLEY_PORT_ID
,TYPE
,RATE
,FORMAT(EFFECTIVE_FROM, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as EFFECTIVE_FROM
,FORMAT(EFFECTIVE_TO, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as EFFECTIVE_TO
,B_CREDATE
,B_UPDDATE
from [dbo].[GD_CONTAINER_RATES]

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT MAX(B_UPDDATE) as MAX_B_UPDDATE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.Sink_Country_Table_Name} WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT COUNT(1) as data FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_COUNTRY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Country_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Country_Class_Name}' AS B_CLASSNAME,
ENTERPRISE_REF_COUNTRY_ID,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
COUNTRY_CODE_A2,
COUNTRY_CODE_A3,
COUNTRY_NAME,
COUNTRY_LOCAL_NAME,
COUNTRY_UN_CODE 
FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_COUNTRY WITH(NOLOCK) 
WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Country_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'
SELECT MAX(B_UPDDATE) as MAX_B_UPDDATE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.Sink_Currency_Table_Name} WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT COUNT(1) as data FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_CURRENCY WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Currency_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Currency_Class_Name}' AS B_CLASSNAME,
ENTERPRISE_REF_CURENCY_ID,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
CURRENCY_CODE,
CURRENCY_NAME
FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_CURRENCY WITH(NOLOCK) 
WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Currency_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'
SELECT MAX(B_UPDDATE) as MAX_B_UPDDATE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.Sink_Dma_Table_Name} WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT COUNT(1) as data FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_DMA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Dma_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Dma_Class_Name}' as B_CLASSNAME,
ENTERPRISE_REF_DMA_ID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_BATCHID,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
DMA_REGION
FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_DMA WITH(NOLOCK) 
WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Dma_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'

SELECT 
SinkDatabaseName,
SinkTableName,
SemarchyJobName,
TableClassName,
SinkTableSchemaName FROM [EntRef].[SemarchyIntegration] WITH(NOLOCk)

SELECT DISTINCT 
POSTAL_CODE_MASTER_ID,
'@{item().TableClassName}' AS B_CLASSNAME,
B_DELETETYPE,
B_DELETEDATE,
CASE
WHEN B_DELETETYPE='SOFT_DELETE' THEN 'semadmin'
ELSE B_DELETEAUTHOR END AS B_DELETEAUTHOR,
CASE
WHEN B_DELETETYPE='SOFT_DELETE' THEN NEWID()
ELSE B_DELETEOPERATION END AS B_DELETEOPERATION,
B_DELETEPATH,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
POSTAL_CODE,
STATE_OR_PROVINCE_CODE,
CITY_NAME,
CITY_ABBREVIATION,
COUNTRY_CODE,
TIME_ZONE,
OBSERVES_DST,
LONGITUDE,
IS_PREFERRED_CITY_NAME,
POSTAL_CODE_TYPE,
MSA_CODE,
--F_MSA_ID,
FIPS_CODE,
LATITUDE
FROM [EntRef].[PostalCodes] WITH(NOLOCK)

Truncate Table [EntRef].[PostalCodes] ;
select 1 as succeeded;
SELECT COUNT(1) as data FROM dbo.GD_ENT_REF_POSTAL_CODE WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT 
ENT_REF_POSTAL_CODE_ID,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Postalcode_Class_Name}' AS B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
POSTAL_CODE,
STATE_OR_PROVINCE_CODE,
CITY_NAME,
CITY_ABBREVIATION,
COUNTRY_CODE,
TIME_ZONE,
OBSERVES_DST,
LATITUDE,
LONGITUDE,
IS_PREFERRED_CITY_NAME,
POSTAL_CODE_TYPE,
F_MSA_ID,
FIPS_CODE
FROM dbo.GD_ENT_REF_POSTAL_CODE WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT MAX(B_UPDDATE) as MAX_B_UPDDATE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.Sink_Time_Zone_EFF_DT_Table_Name} WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT COUNT(1) as data FROM GD_ENT_REF_TIME_ZONE_EFF_DT WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Time_Zone_EFF_DT_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Time_Zone_EFF_DT_Class_Name}' as B_CLASSNAME,
ENT_REF_TIME_ZN_EFF_DT_ID,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
TIME_ZONE_EFFECTIVE_YEAR,
DST_START_DT,
DST_END_DT,
F_ENTERPRISE_REF_TIME_ZONE
FROM GD_ENT_REF_TIME_ZONE_EFF_DT WITH(NOLOCK) 
WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Time_Zone_EFF_DT_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'
SELECT MAX(B_UPDDATE) as MAX_B_UPDDATE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.Sink_Time_Zone_Table_Name} WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT COUNT(1) as data FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_TIME_ZONE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Time_Zone_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'@{pipeline().parameters.Time_Zone_Class_Name}' as B_CLASSNAME,
ENTERP_REF_TIME_ZONE_ID,
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
TIME_ZONE_NAME,
TIME_ZONE_ABR_STD,
TIME_ZONE_ABR_DST,
UTC_OFFSET_STD,
UTC_OFFSET_DST
FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_TIME_ZONE WITH(NOLOCK) 
WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('Time_Zone_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'
SELECT MAX(B_UPDDATE) as MAX_B_UPDDATE FROM @{pipeline().parameters.Sink_US_State_Table_Name} WITH(NOLOCK)
SELECT COUNT(1) as data FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_US_STATE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('US_State_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'

SELECT 
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'@{pipeline().parameters.US_State_Class_Name}' as B_CLASSNAME,
ENTERP_REF_US_STATE_ID,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_UPDATOR,
STATE_CODE,
STATE_NAME
FROM GD_ENTERPRISE_REF_US_STATE WITH(NOLOCK) 
WHERE B_UPDDATE>'@{activity('US_State_Sink_Max_Date').output.firstRow.MAX_B_UPDDATE}'
